General.Name: Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive parts and aircrafts in China. The company offers aluminum alloy auto wheels; aluminum alloy motorcycle wheels; magnesium alloy parts, such as cross car beam, front-end structure, seat brackets, lift gate closure, transmission cases, etc.; steel stamping parts; and environmental protection coating products, including automotive fasteners, automotive non-standard parts, automotive stamping parts, aerospace parts, and wind power parts. Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Xinchang, China.

2.Name: Mr. Ya  Li
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
